japan.title: Astar Japan Lab
japan.description: Astar Japan Lab fuels the growth of Japanese services and businesses by conducting research and development, gathering knowledge, and collaborating with exciting and established companies.

features.business_opportunities: Creating business opportunities in Japan with Astar Network

features.vc: Introduction of overseas VC for web startups from Japan

members.title: Registered Members
members.description: Companies and communities that wish to join our organization and have been approved by the participating companies in the organization.

use_cases.title: Use Cases
use_cases.sony: Sony Network Communications and Astar Network created a joint incubation program that leveraged some of the world's top innovators to help drive growth for 19 Web3 startups.
use_cases.toyota: Toyota sponsored their first Web3 hackathon to develop DAO tooling on the Astar Network that supported intra-company projects designed to drive innovation.
use_cases.calbee: Leading Japanese snack food maker Calbee Inc. deploys its Evolving Potato Chip NFTs on the Astar blockchain as part of a new "NFT Chips" promotional campaign.
use_cases.eren: Iconic Japanese web manga series "Eren The Southpaw" used Astar to mint 2 street art masterpieces, "The Black Monster" and "Night in Chelsea" as NFTs.
use_cases.nikkei: Astar Network advertised in Nikkei Newspaper and distributed NFT
use_cases.candy: Final Fantasy concept artist Yoshitaka Amano brought his first "Candy Girl" digital collection to Astar Network. This global project brings together art, storytelling, and fashion using blockchain technologies.

newsletter.title: Join Our Newsletter!
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest update in Japanese.
